body:
Im from 1982, And what happened here? Last time I heard, pinballs were all the rage, what are these Xbox Ones and Ps4's?

Anyway, Ask me anything.

title: Hello!

replies.body: What was the first game that you ever played!?1?1?
replies.body_tagged: What was the first game that you ever played!?1?1?

replies.body:
I noticed you've only really played Nebula - why don't you go out and try different gamemodes! I suggest CTH and Nexus - They're really enjoyable!
<3

replies.body: Welcome to the Avicus Network! If you have any questions, feel free to contact me or any staff member! Also, don't be afraid to hop onto our TeamSpeak server and start a chat with us! Anyways, what's your favourite movie?
